==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|仕|手}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|して}}

# [[doer]]
# [[protagonist]] in a [[noh]] drama
# [[operator]], [[speculator]]

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|為手}}

====Derived terms====
* {{l|ja|仕手株}} (''shitekabu''): speculative stock
* {{l|ja|仕手戦}} (''shitesen''): large-scale speculative go around
* {{l|ja|仕手柱}} (''shitebashira''): upstage right pillar (on a noh stage), where the main actor stands at the start and end of the play
* {{l|ja|仕手相場}} (''shite sōba''): speculators' market, speculative market
